title: Land for rent - Piliyandala for busness purposes
details: Empty Land for rent in Piliyandala. Suitable for medium scale business. Land located in excellent location which easy access to Piliyandala, Rathmalana, Bokundara, Boralesgamuwa, Katubedda, Maharagama towns and Kottawa or Kahathuduwa Highway entrances. Can be used for parking space for delivery vehicles, for good storage space or bulid a wehere house as your busines nature. Long tearm leas agrment can be prepaired as your business needs.
